Content.Title: 2022 Pharm. D./MBA Candidate
Content.Tagline:
I have spent the past several years honing my skills for a career of true service.
From patient counseling to point of care testing, I specialize in providing top-quality care.
Memberships: NCPA National Student Leadership Council Secretary
Fellowship of Christian Pharmacists Legislative Committee
Oklahoma Society of Health-System Pharmacists Co-founding Chair and Secretary

Content.ExperienceTagline: I've been blessed with the opportunity to serve in a diverse set of work and volunteer experiences.

Content.Detail: Southwestern Oklahoma State University College of Pharmacy; Weatherford, OK (May 2022)
Southwestern Oklahoma State University School of Business and Technology; Weatherford, OK (May 2022)
Pre-pharmacy Curriculum, Southwestern Oklahoma State University College of Pharmacy; Weatherford, OK (May 2018)

Institutional rotation at a small hospital in northeastern Oklahoma. Filled requests from doctors and nurses, met with healthcare professionals, and applied patient care process to real-life scenarios.

Community-based rotation at a large-scale independent community pharmacy in northeastern Oklahoma. Participated in team meetings as well as conversations between doctors, insurance companies, and other healthcare professionals.
